page.title: 03Railway works,Swindon
page.content: It was announced recently that the Railway works would close in 1986. There will be no reprieve this time for the 2,300 workers.This is the end of the line for the Works after years of uncertainty,in the cause of efficiency . This year the Works were to celebrate their 150th. anniversary of high quengineering which had been the hallmark of the G.W.R. Most local celebrations have been cancelled. A council survey predicts a rise in the crime-rate,family disruption and health problems. The unemployment could create a major problem for the town despite the influx of modern light industry. There has been a number of rallies held,calling on British Rail to change their plans, but this is most unlikely.
